title: Experimental Project-Based Education to Overcome Barriers to IMS Learning Design Adoption

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional design concepts and project management experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing language education design capabilities in limited technological environments (no PCs, smartphone-centric).

learning_goals: Participants can create learning designs utilizing core IMS LD (Learning Design) elements (Levels A, B) with over 80% accuracy
Participants can evaluate the efficiency of IMS LD design processes with over 75% accuracy by comparing paper-based and digital tools
Participants can identify at least three barriers to IMS LD adoption in corporate language education contexts and propose improvement measures

resources: IMS LD (Learning Design) Element Paper Piece Kit
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
